title: Taehwan (Jack) Kim
text: Greetings! I’m Jack. Junior and Economics major at Pomona College. Formerly of Class of 2024, finally back at school after serving in the Republic of Korea Army Special Forces. My interest lies in the world of finance and value investing. Love to play soccer (lifelong Arsenal fan) and love to share my military endeavors.

title: Case Analysis 2: Premier League 2021-2022
text:
TidyTuesday Reference
Original Data Source
Objective of the Analysis: Which referee gave out the most yellow cards to Arsenal during the 2021-2022 season?
As a lifelong Arsenal fan, I wanted to find out which referees tend to be harsher on Arsenal.


---- Compiling #TidyTuesday Information for 2023-04-04 ----

── Downloading files ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

  1 of 1: "soccer21-22.csv"

✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()

Craig Pawson handed out the most yellow cards to Arsenal.

title: Case Analysis 1: Olympics
text:
TidyTuesday Reference
Original Data Source
Objective: Let’s find out which nations are represented the most in the top 10 most successful athlete list (measured by medal count). Which countries have produced the best talents?


---- Compiling #TidyTuesday Information for 2024-08-06 ----

USSR and United States produced the highest number of most successful athletes.
